Hancom Office 2018 engine upgrade improves performance / compatibility.

[Common]
1. Improved file compatibility
2. Improved spell checking
3. Apply new chart
4. Add name dictionary data

[HWP]
1. hwpx file format support.
2. support rendering for checkbox bullet
3. Supports rendering of borderless characters
4. extend overview / paragraph addition function
5. New formula font support

[HWord]
1. improved Smartart compatibility
2. improved import for RTF document
3. improved punctuation marks in vertical writing
4. Improved numbering

[HCell]
1. Add PivotTable filter button
2. Improved Compatibility of Shape Effects
3. Improved IHTML filter compatibility
4. Improved VBA compatibility

[HShow]
1. improved Smartart compatibility
2. Improved Compatibility of Shape Effects

[ETC]
1. Enhance VoiceOver function
